trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Garner
There were no other sightings in Garner on or around October 24th 2011
Summary: Orange/Red Orb Flying around in figure eight
divs: Sighting Details8:04 PM EST Oct 24, 2011 Garner, NC I was out front of my home looking up and then all of a sudden noticed a orange orb and it was going North and then South and almost did a figure 8. Then to the North, another orb appeared almost in the same direction. And then I hear this loud roar from a jet. Most likely coming to find these objects. Both disappeared after 5 minutes and it's now 8:11 pm and they have not come back.
